items.name: Reiko
items.text: I met Verma 20 years ago and fell in love with India I would recommend a homestay with Verma's family to any beginner in India. Verma is one of the few governments certified guides who can guide you throughout India. Please feel free to contact Mr. Verma for any consultation regarding India, including Japanese, English, French, Indian, etc. interpretation and business coordination consultation.

items.name: Kazuyo Konaka
items.text: I have been staying with Verma's family for more than 10 years now. My job is to translate silk thread cloth and other fabrics to be made in India. He is very helpful when I ask him to do a lot of things, and they are always willing to help me find them. He understands the hearts of Japanese people very well. He is a grateful person.

items.name: Ms. Noriko Shinna
items.text: I was very anxious about my first trip to India alone, but I was able to enjoy sightseeing in India while staying at Verma's house with a homestay in a safe and comfortable environment.
